attributes.action: Get ITV to sort out good contracts to keep Gordon, Gino and Fred series going.
attributes.additional_details: They don't do anything else for us, so one small thing
attributes.background: We want the show to stay so ITV need to sort themselves out and do whatever the guys need

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about commissioning of television programmes are a matter for broadcasters, not the UK Government or Parliament.
